data.title: Golden Globes: Ricky Gervais makes Hollywood stars squirm
data.meta_description: It was the annual slaying of Hollywood’s sacred powerbrokers and, as Ricky Gervais told his starry audience, it was his last appearance so who cares who gets upset.On the podium as host of the Golden Globes awards for the fifth time, Gervais aimed high with his yearly evisceration of the film indust
data.text:
It was the annual slaying of Hollywood’s sacred powerbrokers and, as Ricky Gervais told his starry audience, it was his last appearance so who cares who gets upset.

On the podium as host of the Golden Globes awards for the fifth time, Gervais aimed high with his yearly evisceration of the film industry as it held its first preening session of the decade.

Apple, which aspires to conquer the streaming industry, was lambasted for “running sweatshops in China” while its chief executive, Tim Cook, sat near by.

Leonardo DiCaprio was mocked for the youthfulness of his girlfriends and Joe Pesci, a wizened master of Mafia films, was compared to Baby Yoda.
